docs.title: Welcome to My MkDocs Project
docs.text: This is an example MkDocs project using the Material theme.

docs.title: Get Started
docs.text:
1. Edit the index.md file to update the homepage content.
  2. Add more pages in the docs/ directory.
  3. Customize your site using the mkdocs.yml file.

Check out the About page to learn more.

docs.title: About This Project
docs.text: This is an example project created with MkDocs and the Material theme. You can add as many pages as you need, and they will automatically be added to the navigation.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Write documentation in Markdown.
  • Use the Material Design theme for a professional look.
  • Host on GitHub Pages easily.

docs.text: -to pull  a docker image: ''docker pull name-image''
